title: Car Model - Detail Page - Image Gallery
user_story:
As a visitor\
On the CAR MODEL detail page\
I want to see a gallery of all attached IMAGEs\
So I can get a visual impression of the car from different angles
description:
# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business logic)**

* the existing car model detail page is extended to display a prominent section for the connected images
* this section contains:
  * a headline h2 describing the relationship
  * a list of all image that are attached to the car model (in small resolution)
    * linked to the resp. image detail pages
  * a number with the amount of connected images
* the section is not shown when there are no images attached to the car model

**Quality Gates**

* Behavior tests (Playwright) are extended
* Accessibility tests are extended
* Performance tests are extended
* Local copy of the API spec is updated to a matching version

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* sort, pagination, filter, search within the list
